searchDocs.title: Startâ€‹
searchDocs.content: </> Rorooms:Start() â†’Â () Starts Rorooms.

searchDocs.title: Configureâ€‹
searchDocs.content: </> Rorooms:Configure(Config:Â Config) â†’Â ()

searchDocs.title: â€‹
searchDocs.content: interface Config { Test:Â boolean? }  Reconciles Rorooms' config to your liking. Config type available here

searchDocs.title: Promptâ€‹
searchDocs.content: This item only works when running on the client. Client </> Rorooms:Prompt(Prompt:Â Prompt) â†’Â () Prompts the client, with support for callback buttons. Prompt type available here

searchDocs.title: Robloxâ€‹
searchDocs.content: Get the Rorooms modelInsert it from the ToolboxPlace into ReplicatedStorage

searchDocs.title: Wallyâ€‹
searchDocs.content: Copy the Wally package detailsPaste it into your wally.toml dependenciesRun wally install

searchDocs.title: Game settingsâ€‹
searchDocs.content: For Rorooms to properly function, you need to enable a few Security settings within your Game Settings. This allows Rorooms to access the APIs its features rely on.

searchDocs.title: Animated seats ğŸª‘â€‹
searchDocs.content: Seats enhanced with animation and prompting, placed in-world as Seat instances with the RR_AnimatedSeat tag.  Attribute	Type	RequiredRR_PromptToSit	boolean	âŒ

searchDocs.title: Childrenâ€‹
searchDocs.content: "Animation" - Animation

searchDocs.title: Item givers ğŸ«´â€‹
searchDocs.content: Prompters that give out items, placed in-world as BasePart instances with the RR_ItemGiver tag.  Attribute	Type	RequiredRR_ItemId	string	âœ…

searchDocs.title: Locked zones ğŸ”’â€‹
searchDocs.content: Parts that conditionally respawn players within their bounds, placed in-world as BasePart instances with the RR_LockedZone tag.  Attribute	Type	RequiredRR_LevelRequirement	number	âŒ RR_GamepassRequirement	number	âŒ

searchDocs.title: Locked doors ğŸ”’â€‹
searchDocs.content: Parts that conditionally prevent players from walking through them, placed in-world as BasePart instances with the RR_LockedDoor tag.  Attribute	Type	RequiredRR_LevelRequirement	number	âŒ RR_GamepassRequirement	number	âŒ

searchDocs.title: World teleporters ğŸŒâ€‹
searchDocs.content: Prompters that teleport the player to other Rorooms worlds, placed in-world as BasePart instances with the RR_WorldTeleporter tag.  Attribute	Type	RequiredRR_PlaceId	number	âœ…

searchDocs.title: Animated items ğŸ”§â€‹
searchDocs.content: Items that play animations, placed in-world as Tool instances with the RR_AnimatedItem tag.

searchDocs.title: Childrenâ€‹
searchDocs.content: Animations must be arranged in numerical order.  "RR_ItemAnimations" - Folder "1" - Animation "2" - Animation "..." - Animation

searchDocs.title: Variant cyclers ğŸ”â€‹
searchDocs.content: Prompters that cycle between various models, placed in-world as BasePart instances with the RR_VariantCycler tag.

searchDocs.title: Childrenâ€‹
searchDocs.content: Variant models must be arranged in numerical order.  "1" - Model"2" - Model"..." - Model

searchDocs.title: Easy loaderâ€‹
searchDocs.content: Roles are added as Configuration instances within the Roles folder:  [Explorer panel] â””â”€â”€ Rorooms/ â””â”€â”€ EasyLoader/ â””â”€â”€ Config/ â””â”€â”€ Roles/ â””â”€â”€ <-- Your roles here [Properties panel] â””â”€â”€ Attributes/ â””â”€â”€ <-- Your properties here

searchDocs.title: Manual configâ€‹
searchDocs.content: Rorooms:Configure({ Systems = { Profiles = { Roles = { MyRole = { -- Properties here } } } } })

searchDocs.title: Propertiesâ€‹
searchDocs.content: Attribute	Type	RequiredRoleId	string	âš ï¸ - Only w/ easy loader Name	string	âŒ Color	Color3	âŒ LayoutOrder	number	âŒ LevelRequirement	number	âŒ GamepassRequirement	number	âŒ

searchDocs.title: Easy loaderâ€‹
searchDocs.content: Items are added as Tool instances within the Items folder:  [Explorer panel] â””â”€â”€ Rorooms/ â””â”€â”€ EasyLoader/ â””â”€â”€ Config/ â””â”€â”€ Items/ â””â”€â”€ <-- Your items here [Properties panel] â””â”€â”€ Attributes/ â””â”€â”€ <-- Your properties here

searchDocs.title: Manual configâ€‹
searchDocs.content: Rorooms:Configure({ Systems = { Items = { Items = { MyItem = { -- Properties here } } } } })

searchDocs.title: Propertiesâ€‹
searchDocs.content: Property	Type	RequiredItemId	string	âš ï¸ - Only w/ easy loader Tool	Tool	âš ï¸ - Only w/ manual config DisplayName	string	âŒ LevelRequirement	number	âŒ GamepassRequirement	number	âŒ Category	string	âŒ Color	Color3	âŒ LabelText	string	âŒ LabelIcon	string	âŒ

searchDocs.title: Easy loaderâ€‹
searchDocs.content: Emotes are added as Animation instances within the Emotes folder:  [Explorer panel] â””â”€â”€ Rorooms/ â””â”€â”€ EasyLoader/ â””â”€â”€ Config/ â””â”€â”€ Emotes/ â””â”€â”€ <-- Your items here [Properties panel] â””â”€â”€ Attributes/ â””â”€â”€ <-- Your properties here

searchDocs.title: Manual configâ€‹
searchDocs.content: Rorooms:Configure({ Systems = { Emotes = { Emotes = { MyEmote = { -- Properties here } } } } })

searchDocs.title: Propertiesâ€‹
searchDocs.content: Attribute	Type	RequiredEmoteId	string	âš ï¸ - Only w/ easy loader Animation	Animation	âœ… - Only w/ manual config Emoji	string	âŒ AllowMovement	boolean	âŒ DisplayName	string	âŒ LevelRequirement	number	âŒ GamepassRequirement	number	âŒ Category	string	âŒ Color	Color3	âŒ LabelText	string	âŒ LabelIcon	string	âŒ

searchDocs.title: Publishingâ€‹
searchDocs.content: Visit rorooms.com/publish    Copy your world's PlaceId    Paste it in    Publish! ğŸ‰

searchDocs.title: Featuring your own worldsâ€‹
searchDocs.content: List your own worlds right at the top of the menu with a few lines:  Rorooms:Configure({ Systems = { Worlds = { FeaturedWorlds = { -- Your PlaceIds here } } } })

searchDocs.title: Disabling discoveryâ€‹
searchDocs.content: You may not want to participate in Rorooms' worlds network, and that choice is supported. Understand that by doing this, your world will not receive support from any other worlds.  Rorooms:Configure({ Systems = { Worlds = { DiscoveryEnabled = false, Enabled = false, -- If you don't want to feature your own worlds } } })

searchDocs.title: Setting a custom themeâ€‹
searchDocs.content: Rorooms:Configure({ Systems = { UI = { OnyxUITheme = { -- Colors = { -- Primary = { -- Main = Color3.fromRGB(255, 255, 255), -- }, -- Base = { -- Main = Color3.fromRGB(0, 0, 0), -- }, -- BaseContent = { -- Main = Color3.fromRGB(255, 255, 255), -- }, -- Neutral = { -- Main = Color3.fromRGB(51, 47, 46), -- }, -- NeutralContent = { -- Main = Color3.fromRGB(196, 196, 195), -- }, -- }, -- Font = { -- Body = "rbxasset://fonts/families/Montserrat.json", -- Heading = "rbxasset://fonts/families/Montserrat.json", -- Monospace = "rbxasset://fonts/families/Montserrat.json", -- }, -- FontWeight = { -- Body = Enum.FontWeight.SemiBold, -- Bold = Enum.FontWeight.Bold, -- Heading = Enum.FontWeight.Bold, -- }, -- TextSize = { -- Base = 17, -- }, -- CornerRadius = { -- Base = 6, -- }, -- StrokeThickness = { -- Base = 1, -- }, -- SpringSpeed = { -- Base = 60, -- }, -- SpringDampening = { -- Base = 1.25, -- }, } } } })   See the full list of theme properties here.
